H0.text: which type of hematoma is a result of torn bridging meningeal veins. Epidural Hematoma

H1.text: which type of hematoma is a result of torn bridging meningeal veins. Intracerebral Hematoma

H2.text: which type of hematoma is a result of torn bridging meningeal veins. Subarachnoid Hematoma

H3.text: which type of hematoma is a result of torn bridging meningeal veins. subdural hematoma

A4.text: A subdural hematoma (SDH) is a type of bleeding... usually results from rips in bridging veins that cross the subdural space.

A5.text: Epidural hematomas are usually caused by rips in arteries, resulting in a build-up of blood between the dura mater and the skull.
